label: Measurement
comment: An amount, size, or extent as established by measuring.

datatypeProperties.comment: A measurement method expressed as text.
A code specifying the operator, such as, less than, greater than or equal to, for comparing two actual measures.
A measure of a condition for this measurement.
The percent of tolerance of this calibrated measurement.
The code specifying a value for this calibrated measurement.
The code specifying a quantification type for this calibrated measurement, such as measured, calculated, or estimated.
An actual measure for this measurement.

referencedBy.comment: A scheduled calibrated measurement reported for this monitoring sensor.
A measurement of the flashpoint temperature of these transported dangerous goods.
The measurement of the control temperature of these transported dangerous goods.
A calibrated measurement of precision for this monitoring sensor.
The measurement of the emergency temperature of these transported dangerous goods.
A measurement associated with this document clause.
An actual calibrated measurement reported for this monitoring sensor.
